name: American History I
description: Challenge yourself with questions related to key events, influential figures, and pivotal moments in American history.

questions.description: Who was the first President of the United States?
What document declared the American colonies' independence from Britain?
Which war was fought between the Northern states (Union) and the Southern states (Confederacy) from 1861 to 1865?
Who is known for leading the Lewis and Clark Expedition to explore the western territories of the United States?
What landmark speech by Martin Luther King Jr. called for racial equality and civil rights?
Which event marked the beginning of the Great Depression in the United States?
Who was the primary author of the United States Constitution?
What was the purpose of the Underground Railroad during the 19th century?
answers: To transport goods across state lines
To assist escaped slaves in reaching freedom
questions.correctAnswer: To assist escaped slaves in reaching freedom

questions.description: Which American aviator made the first solo nonstop transatlantic flight in 1927?
What major event led to the United States' entry into World War II?
